name: Mai Chau Pu Luong Private Tour 2 days
description: A nature Reserve near Mai Chau town of the Thai people is PU LUONG, it is a great choice for your two days or weekend from Hanoi, you can visit and stay in the traditional home of the Thai – one of Vietnam 54 ethnic minorities, visit to these beautiful villages you will also have chance to walk or trek on trails less travelled, meeting the locals....all of this will simply offer you an unforgettable experience.
